title: About
text:
This tutorial builds on the success of the 2024 edition to focus on making reproducible manuscripts. Participants will learn:

Fundamental concepts of Reproducible Research (RR)
Tools and software to facilitate reproducibility
Steps to make manuscripts fully reproducible
How to foster a community around RR in ITS

title: About
text:

title: About
text:
Relevance
Given the interdisciplinary and data-driven nature of Intelligent Transportation Systems (ITS), reproducibility ensures scientific credibility and real-world impact.

title: Schedule
text:
Session 1 (9:00am - 10:00am): Introduction to Reproducible Research
- Lecture and activity
Break (10:00am - 10:15am)
Session 2 (10:15am - 11:15am): Tools for collaboration
- Lecture and computer exercise
Break (11:15am - 11:30am)
Session 3 (11:30am - 12:45pm): Making manuscripts reproducible
- Lecture, exercise, and Q&A
Lunch (Optional, 12:45pm - 1:30pm)

title: Reproducibility in Transportation Research: A Hands-on Tutorial 2.0 – Reproducible Manuscripts
text:
Welcome
Welcome to the official site of the Reproducibility in Transportation Research Tutorial 2.0 at ITSC 2025. This half-day tutorial will provide participants with hands-on training on how to make their research reproducible using modern tools and practices.
